Frontend application with pages for band listings, band profiles, advertiser ads, registration, and login
Backend API server to manage bands, advertisers, and advertisements data
Database connection to PostgreSQL using environment variables: DB_HOST, DB_PORT, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, DB_NAME
Band registration form capturing band name, bio, picture link, audio sample links, and YouTube video links
Advertiser registration form capturing advertiser details and ad content uploads
User authentication system for bands and advertisers with login/logout functionality
Band profile pages displaying bio, images, audio players for samples, and embedded YouTube videos
Advertisement display system integrated throughout the site
Browse page for users to explore band profiles and listen to audio samples
Admin or dashboard views for bands and advertisers to manage their own content
Responsive UI design implementing floral white background and dark goldenrod elements
API endpoints for user registration, login, band data management, and advertisement handling
Media handling for storing and serving band images, audio files, and ad content
Role-based access control distinguishing between bands, advertisers, and general users
Package.json scripts: `install:all` for installing frontend and backend dependencies, `dev` for concurrent development startup
